lines:
Kwan, Suns Sing --2

With the old-time rood will and sincerest. good wishes 
for the days ahead, believe me

Always faithfully yours,

AES/G
raw: Kwan, Suns Sing --2 With the old-time rood will and sincerest. good wishes for the days ahead, believe me Always faithfully yours, AES/G

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter from Head of School Alfred E. Stearns to Sung Sing Kwan about Kwan's gift of a scroll to Stearns.

metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
